description: The round payoff this round was 92. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 46.
The game's outcome depends on the combination of actions chosen by both players
Choosing option 1 can be a cooperative strategy that yields an equal share of the payoff
There's a strategic consideration for players to potentially deviate from cooperation by choosing option 2 if they anticipate their opponent will choose option 1
